sentences.sContent: Of course I wonder if happiness tactics that come from someone elsecan ever stick.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course I wonder if happiness tactics that come from someone elsecan ever stick.
sentences.sCn: 当然我怀疑来自与某人的快乐策略是否对其他人有用。

sentences.sContent: I think it will also point to areas where we can do better and can make improvements in our strategy and tactics," he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think it will also point to areas where we can do better and can make improvements in our strategy and tactics," he said.
sentences.sCn: 我认为，报告还会指出在哪些领域我们能够做得更好，还有我们可以在哪些领域提高我们的策略和战术。

words.tran: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

trans.tranOther: the art and science of the detailed direction and control of movement or manoeuvre of forces in battle to achieve an aim or task
